dataset.title: Synonymic Checklists of the Vascular Plants of the World

abstract.para: World Ferns and World Plants are synonymic checklists of the vascular plants of the world (including ferns and lycophytes). The data set has been compiled over the last 30 years by starting from the basic data of the Kew Index and the Index Filicum. These names (over 1 million) have been cross-checked against local or regional floras, checklists and treatments. Large subsets of the database have been cross-checked by experts for certain groups. In the current status over 97 % of the names have been verified, and distribution data, newer checklists and/or floras are available for almost all countries and regions. Regions with remaining data deficiencies include parts of Malesia (Sumatra, Lesser Sunda Islands, Moluccas, Sulawesi), parts of Central Africa (D.R. Congo [Zaire], Rwanda, Burundi, Equatorial Guinea), Central Asia (Tajikistan, Uzbekistan), some smaller Pacific islands, Vanuatu and some families of India and Bangladesh. The states of the former Yugoslavia have not yet been completely separated, and the sixth and last part of the Conspectus Florae Caucasiae has yet to appear. A small subset of obscure old names (nomina nuda, incomplete or missing type material) which could not be assigned as synonyms to existing names have been deliberately omitted.
